items.text: back of length outside off, punched towards long-on
length outside off, punched on the up, past the cover fielder for a couple
length ball, on the pads, tucked away towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, no run

items.text: length outside off, comes forward and defends
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, punches it through point

items.preText:
Samuels to face his first ball, a wide slip in place

SarfBD: "Not sure whether Bangladesh really wanted that wicket."

Ishaque: "That is flying Tamim for you! Splendid!"
items.text: length, angling in, tucked away towards square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, opens his face to guide it towards backward point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, no run

items.preText: MD. FAHMIDUR RA: "If you are worried about Tamim's fitness. Well...that catch is the answer!"
items.text: length ball, on the pads, on the stumps, tucked away towards backward square leg
slower one, just outside off, nudged towards backward point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.preText: Mak: "I feel like this is a 210 wicket. What is your opinion?" -- Definitely some variable bounce, but hardly any intent from the West Indies batsmen
items.text: length outside off, in the corridor, left alone
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: extra bounce this time, short of length and hitting near the splice of the bat, Samuels opens the face at the last moment to push it towards point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: length outside off, played from the crease, pushed towards points once again
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: length outside off, defended towards cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: fuller around off and middle, pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
length outside off, opens the face of the bat to run it towards third man
back of length, on the pads, tucked away towards deep square leg, Liton Das sprints from fine leg and puts in the slide to keep it to two
length ball around off, a bit of tail in, defended down the wicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, no run

items.text: length around off, pushed between the umpire and the non-striker for a quick single
a touch fuller and on the pads, flicked towards square leg
length, down the leg side and given a wide
length outside off, punched off the back foot past the diving point fielder
offcutter, jumping at the batsman from short of length, surprising the batsman who pushes at it from the back foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: length, wide outside off, Hope looks to hit it on the up, away from the body and ends up slicing it towards backward point, Mehidy Hasan takes a neat catch there, jumping to his right

dismissal.text: SD Hope c Mehidy Hasan Miraz b Mashrafe Mortaza 43 (59b 3x4 0x6) SR: 72.88

items.preText:
Shimron Hetmyer walks in

Al: "I think someone may have told the Windies players to study England to learn how to play ODI cricket. Unfortunately all the footage they watched was pre 2015 (maybe pre 1980 in fact!)"
items.text: length on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: short of length from round the wicket, pulled behind square to get off the mark
